MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CW11 postcode area of Sandbach, affecting properties in Lime Close and surrounding streets.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.28AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of repairs required to the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.44AM on 4th April 2021.
